entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers early this afternoon. High 9. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:37 AM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few rain showers beginning late this evening then changing to snow or ice pellets after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:37 AM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Local ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 7. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:37 AM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023
